title: How to Check Fortnite Mobile Stats

steps.headline: Open a web browser.
steps.description: You can either access a web browser from a computer or on your mobile phone. Popular ones include Firefox and Chrome.

steps.headline: Type in the player name in the provided text field.
Hit ↵ Enter.
steps.description: You will now be able to see a collection of stats on the player that you entered.

text: Open a web browser. You can either access a web browser from a computer or on your mobile phone. Popular ones include Firefox and Chrome. Navigate to https://statsv2.fortnitetracker.com/.  Type in the player name in the provided text field.  Hit ↵ Enter. You will now be able to see a collection of stats on the player that you entered.
